title: How to improve my scientific or technical writing skills - Quora

response.answer_text: Atul Mathur, a professional engineer and technical copywriter in Singapore describes technical writing in this way, “Technical writing involves two key competencies. The first is the ability to understand technical language; the second is being able to express that knowledge in a clear, concise, and coherent manner.” As you see, a technical writer should be “master of his craft”. But how to improve necessary skills and become a successful professional? Learn more How to Improve Your Technical Writing Skills
